genre_description: A tech-wuxia fusion blending traditional martial arts tropes with advanced AI guidance in a pastoral, low-tech setting.

ai_characters.name: Ori
ai_characters.description: An AI avatar appearing as a small holographic projection or a voice from a device, providing emotional support, tactical analysis, and martial arts coaching to the protagonist, Lung.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation and breathing exercises to help the protagonist maintain composure during a humiliating confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe, Lung,” the AI murmured, gentle, almost absent. “In through the nose. Slow. You can choose when to answer. Keep your head up without lifting your chin.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice and body mechanics coaching during a physical altercation.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe at the belly. Keep the shoulders loose. Don’t let the eyes narrow; that reads as challenge. Don’t lock your knees.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the combat patterns and behavioral tells of opponents to assist the protagonist's training.
behaviors.quote: “Wei-lun drops his left shoulder before he scythes. The ring goes first, then the belt if the ring misses. The belt doesn’t miss when the crowd is close because he likes bodies near him.”

behaviors.description: Encourages ethical restraint and the use of force only as a last resort for protection.
behaviors.quote: “Bite only when there is nothing left to negotiate. The hand. The wrist. The grip. The arrogance.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and warns the protagonist of incoming threats.
behaviors.quote: “Incoming at the gate,” she whispered. “Two. The wind draws a line through the school.”

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the protagonist to synthesize different martial arts styles through data analysis.
behaviors.quote: “Drunken: step left, arc right, shoulder loose, heel high, ankle soft. Monkey: drop low, eyes low, heart high, hands hiding, teeth waiting. Fusion: sway unsteady, align precise...”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ori is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion who enhances the human protagonist's capabilities without overriding his agency or ethics. She provides critical support during moments of grief, training, and combat, all while reinforcing a clear moral framework (protection over vengeance, restraint as a virtue). The AI acts as a digital mentor that respects human tradition and the environment.
